sense.gloss: overwhelming, conquering, dominating, sweeping (the world), swaying
to bend, to flutter, to wave
to yield to, to be swayed by, to bow to, to obey
to seduce, to win over, to conquer
to win over, to win one's heart, to subdue
ruling the times, holding sway over the minds of the people

r_ele.r: いっせいをふうびする

sense.gloss: take the world by storm, to hold sway over the minds of the people
to bow (in great numbers) to a greater authority, to be drawn (en masse) to something attractive, even the plants yield

sdata.j: カーテンが↑風↑↓かぜ↓に↑靡↑↓なび↓いてる。
sdata.e: The curtains are fluttering in the wind.
